summary: This script sets up a Redis server process, running it in the background and disowning it to prevent termination on script exit. The port number is not specified, but information can be posted on a public board for users to locate it.

details.comment: This script sets up a Redis server process, running it in the background and disowning it to prevent termination on script exit. The port number is not specified, but information can be posted on a public board for users to locate it.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
# configure the autosave and so on.
redis-server </dev/null &>/dev/null &
disown
# do not know the port. but we can put some information on public board.
